full_summary:
======

**Government Tender Announcement**

**Title**
=======

Licenses for Cloud-based Skills and Training

**Reference Number and Amendment Information**
--------------------------------------------

* Reference number: CB-9396-76511102
* Amendment number: 9
* Solicitation number: CIC-155941

**Publication and Closing Dates**
-----------------------------

* Published on: September 22, 2023
* Tender closing date: November 20, 2023, at 2 p.m. EST

**Tender Description**
-------------------

Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship Canada (IRCC) is seeking a provider to offer up to 200 enterprise user licenses for an initial one-year period and up to 400 licenses for two additional one-year option periods for an online cloud skills and training solution.

**Selection Criteria**
-------------------

The selected provider will be evaluated based on a combined rating of technical merit and price. The objective is to award the contract to the provider offering the highest combined rating.

**Trade Agreements**
-------------------

This tender is open to providers that are part of the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement

**Contracting Entity**
-------------------

The contracting entity for this tender is Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship Canada, located at:

* Address: 70 rue Cremazie, Gatineau, Quebec, Canada, K1A 1L1
* Contact information:

  * Name: Qazi Rasheed
  * Email: [IRCC.BidsReceiving-Receptiondessoumissions.IRCC@cic.gc.ca](mailto:IRCC.BidsReceiving-Receptiondessoumissions.IRCC@cic.gc.ca)
  * Phone: (343) 596-1371

**Tender Documents**
-------------------

The complete tender package, including the Request for Proposal, can be downloaded from the Canadabuys website.

---

([Date and signature of the CTI]) Team Lead for Tender Management IT1212
[cidrama@eamail.frontier.com](mailto:cidrama@eamail.frontier.com
